DOC.criteria: > 18 year old p 25OH vitaminD < 50nmol/l sign inform consent receive antihypertensive antidiabetic treatment sarcoidoses history kidney stone receive 1alfahydroxylated vitamin D treatment plasma creatinin > 120 micromol/l ionised calcium > 1,5 mmol/l treatment calcimimetics active malignancy intestinal malabsorption active pancreatitis former hospitalisation due alcoholic related disease use euphoriant drug pregnancy risk pregnant lactating woman Known allergy cholecalciferol capsule
